name: Ghost Hunters Corp
description:
Hey, are you feeling the soul of a ghost hunter ? Want to send these evil entities back to the afterlife ? Do you like the thrill, alone or in a team ?

Ghost Hunters Corp is a spooky exorcism game inspired by paranormal movies and series. The ghost hunter's mission will be to purify entities haunting places such as castles, mansions and abandoned houses. You will therefore have at your disposal many ghost detection devices, such as the EMF K2 detector, the frequency analyzer, the threat detector, surveillance cameras, etc.
Once the threat has been identified, you will have at your disposal an exorcism protocol which will allow you, by means of various objects and equipment such as the Neutron-Gun, holy water, incense, the Tiger Eye stone ... to return these supernatural creatures where they come from and guarantee the success of your mission.

Multiplayer

Play alone or in groups up to 4 players in cooperation LAN or Steam friends, to exorcise ever more dangerous and powerful ghosts.

Speech Recognition

Ghost Hunters Corp will allow you to use your microphone to interact with the different categorys of ghosts. They will listen to you and understand your request, but be careful not to get on their nerves!

Paranormal Investigation Object and Exorcism:

Successfully achieve your goals to earn money and gain experience, which will allow you to purchase new equipment and materials compatible with exorcising increasingly terrifying ghosts.

Multiple Ghosts

The behaviors of ghosts, as well as their exorcisms, are generated procedurally and with exorcisms for each party. They are classified into several large families, such as Shadows, Poltergeists, Ghosts, Demons, ...

Intelligent Ghosts

Hunting and exorcising a ghost will be far from easy, they will interact with you and adapt their behaviors to your actions.

Immersion

Special attention was paid to the design of a simple and clean interface with realistic graphics and 3D audio in order to offer you a better immersion.
